## `brand.yml`

```yaml
color:
  palette:
    orange: "#F96302"
    white: "#FFFFFF"
    black: "#000000"
  theme:
    primary: orange
    secondary: "#747474"
    light: white
    dark: black

typography:
  body:
    family: Helvetica Nueue LT Pro
  headings:
    family: Helvetica Nueue LT Pro Condensed
    weight: bold
```
:::
